channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- WebSphere MQ
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- WebSphere MQ

item.title: CVE-2018-1503|2024-09-16T17:59:15.374Z -- ibm -- websphere%20mq
item.description: IBM WebSphere MQ 7.5, 8.0, and 9.0 could allow a remotely authenticated attacker to to send invalid or malformed headers that could cause messages to no longer be transmitted via the affected channel. IBM X-Force ID: 141339.

item.title: CVE-2018-1374|2024-09-16T18:29:16.726Z -- ibm -- websphere%20mq
item.description: An IBM WebSphere MQ (Maintenance levels 7.1.0.0 - 7.1.0.9, 7.5.0.0 - 7.5.0.8, 8.0.0.0 - 8.0.0.8, 9.0.0.0 - 9.0.0.2, and 9.0.0 - 9.0.4) client connecting to a Queue Manager could cause a SIGSEGV in the Channel process amqrmppa. IBM X-Force ID: 137775.
